# update(withPanRecognizer:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the feedback filter about a new pan (drag) gesture recognizer event.

## Declaration

```swift
func update(withPanRecognizer panRecognizer: NSPanGestureRecognizer)
```

## Parameters

- **panRecognizer**: The gesture recognizer ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPanGestureRecognizer]) that produced the event.

## Discussion

This method informs the feedback filter about a new pan (drag) gesture recognizer event. Call this method instead of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAlignmentFeedbackFilter/update(with:)] if your event tracking uses gesture recognizers.

## Related Documentation

- **NSGestureRecognizer**: An object that monitors events and calls its action method when a predefined sequence of events occur.
- **NSPanGestureRecognizer**: A continuous gesture recognizer for panning gestures.

## Informing the Filter About Events

- **update(with:)**: Informs the feedback filter about a new event.
